pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, May 5, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual event to recognize the 2020 national recipients of the Prime Minister’s Awards for Teaching Excellence, Teaching Excellence in STEM, and Excellence in Early Childhood Education. He will be joined by Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen and President of the Treasury Board Jean-Yves Duclos.

The event will be streamed live on the “Canadian Innovation” Facebook page via the following link: https://www.facebook.com/events/315112533507909/

Media appearances

9:00 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Miramichi’s Rewind 95.9 FM.

2:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Saskatchewan’s MBC Radio.
